result.arabic_text: يُوسُفُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِي لِذَنۢبِكِۖ إِنَّكِ كُنتِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَاطِـِٔينَ
result.translation: 29. Tet baqli: Yuusufow koo kee yibarrah fanat yekke caagidit derre cabaay numuh mawarsin kaak iyye, isi barrak kee barray atu isi dambiy abtek Yallal dambi cabti esserit, diggah atu dambileelak tiyak teyna kinnitok teetik iyye, Yuusuf dalwah isi nafsi fan secteeh wohul kaa teerre waqdi.
